description:
Kaworu Nagisa, the Fifth Child, comes to NERV to pilot Unit 02 in Asuka`s place. He`s friendly to Shinji, but he`s shrouded in mystery.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Anfang und Ende - Der Letzte Botschafter
Ostatni Posłaniec / Początek i koniec, albo "Pukając do Nieba Bram"
The Beginning and the End, or "Knockin` on the Heaven`s Door"
